## Summary

Describe what this PR changes and why.

## Checklist

- [ ] Tests added/updated (backend and/or frontend)
- [ ] CI is green
- [ ] No build artifacts committed (`dist/`, `coverage/`, `node_modules/`, etc.)
- [ ] Documentation updated where needed

## Risk / Rollback

- **Risk**: What could break?
- **Rollback**: How to revert safely?
